europeana:record.dc:title: Key to the genera of the Palaearctic Oxytorinae, with the description of three new genera (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Rossem, van G.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Ichneumonidae; Oxytorinae; Palaearctic; key; genera
europeana:record.dc:description: A revised key to the Palaearctic genera of the subfamily Oxytorinae (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae) is given. Three new genera are described: Pantomima gen. nov. (type-species: Pantomima festata spec. nov.), Fetialis gen. nov. (type.-species: Fetialis alacris spec. nov.), and Epitropus gen. nov. (type-species: Epitropus insolitus spec. nov.). A tentative key to the females of the subgenus Eusterinx FÃ¶rster, 1868 is included and one new species, Eusterinx (E.) fabulosa spec. nov., is described.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Key to the genera of the Palaearctic Oxytorinae, with the description of three new genera (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 63) (Issue 23)
